goal: Add a /goodbye endpoint to the Flask API that returns a JSON goodbye message, update the JavaScript UI to fetch and display the goodbye message, and add tests to verify the endpoint behavior.
context: The project is a Python Flask API (api/app.py) with a JavaScript frontend (ui/app.js, ui/index.html). Currently there is a /hello endpoint that returns a greeting message. The UI fetches from /hello and displays it. We need to add a parallel /goodbye endpoint following the same pattern. SOPs require all API endpoints to have tests and return JSON responses.
